metadata.title: CVE-2018-11418 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: An issue was discovered in JerryScript 1.0. There is a heap-based bufferover-read in the lit_read_code_unit_from_utf8 function via aRegExp("[\\u0020") payload, related to re_parse_char_class inparser/regexp/re-parser.c.

criterions.comment: iotjs package in esm-apps/jammy is affected and needs fixing.
